title: Pixel 3a massive battery drain in winter
content:
Temperatures around 0Â° Celsius cause massive battery drain on my Pixel 3a (which is still within the recommended temp. range, see https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/9224138)

The phone shuts down when carried around in my pocket for a 2h walk in winter.
It is 1,5years old and the problem only started this winter.

Anyone else experiencing similar issues?
Any advise if this issue qualifies for hardware warranty?
